item.title: 0750 Getting Hugo Image to Work
item.description: The problem Trying to follow the documentation and forum on how to get an image to display did not seem to work, because there is an assumption about how the generated website is laid out. The original objective was to find a few shortcodes as well as vanilla markdown to see if a responsive image could be displayed with captions, etc. The image test.png (2408 x 968) in static was used as input to a number of shortcodes etc, but to no avail, because the structure of the generated website was not taken into account.

item.title: 0744 Icon Libraries
item.description: A youtube video was watched but still to be noted here. SVG SVG on the web bootstrap v5 icons Now has SVG icons. fontawesome The font of icons. feather icons Feather Icons github feather icons with instructions 286 icons in SVG or via JS lordicon css.gg material-ui
